zone.line: and thro the rifts & the windows; & the
flowers & the weeds & the grass & creeping
moss are nourished by its unforbidden
rain. The blue sky is above the wide
it glows
bright blue sky, through the great
bare
rifts on high & thro the boughs of
fig-tree
the marble rooted olive on high, &
through the leaves & flowers of the weeds
even to the dark arcades beneath. I
feel, I see its clear & piercing light
beams
fills the universe & impregnates the
warmth a br
joy inspiring wind with life & light
and interpenetrates all things that
even mee
are even me. For
Yes and thro the highest rift the
noonday waning moon is hanging
as it were out of the solid sky; and
this shows that the atmosphere has the
clearness which it rejoices in
